response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to be $12,000 to you. To facilitate this transaction and ensure a mutually beneficial outcome, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10500}
